column4: hey, where can I get information on improving edgy's boot time?
mine takes a minute or so
it slows down the most after I choose it from grub, and at the splash screen
I'm getting bootchart - I think probably what slows it down most are the PCI errors I get
also do you know why synaptic downloads things at around 3000 B/s, but I've done a speed test that rated it 180 k/s
ah, which are you using? I'm on the defaults
use whatever is closest to you, geographically
where do I change the mirror? sources.list?
system -> admin -> software sources is a graphical interface, but yes - source.lst
no, but you do need the C build environment
and you also have linux-headers installed ?
what are you trying to build ? if it's a 32-bit app then you need 32-bit libraries, 32-bit DEV libraries, and 32-bit headers
what do you mean, "what libraries" ? all of them, of course - glibc, kernel, whatever else the app needs
